columns.name: organisation_path
columns.dc:title: Organisation Path
columns.schema:description: A sequence of colon separated Organisation Codes that fully specifies the upload organisation.

columns.name: client_key
columns.dc:title: Client Key
columns.schema:description: This is a number or code assigned to each individual referred to the commissioned organisation. The client identifier is unique and stable for each individual at the level of the PMHC top level organisation.

columns.name: slk
columns.dc:title: Client - Statistical Linkage Key
columns.schema:description: A key that enables two or more records belonging to the same individual to be brought together.

columns.name: date_of_birth
columns.dc:title: Client - Date of Birth
columns.schema:description: The date on which an individual was born.

columns.name: est_date_of_birth
columns.dc:title: Client - Estimated Date of Birth Flag
columns.schema:description: The date of birth estimate flag records whether or not the client's date of birth has been estimated.

columns.name: client_gender
columns.dc:title: Client - Gender
columns.schema:description: The term 'gender' refers to the way in which a person identifies their masculine or feminine characteristics. A persons gender relates to their deeply held internal and individual sense of gender and is not always exclusively male or female. It may or may not correspond to their sex assigned at birth.

columns.name: client_atsi_status
titles: Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander Status
columns.dc:title: Client - Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander Status
columns.schema:description: Whether a person identifies as being of Aboriginal and/or Torres Strait Islander origin, as represented by a code.

columns.name: country_of_birth
columns.dc:title: Client - Country of Birth
columns.schema:description: The country in which the client was born, as represented by a code.

columns.name: main_lang_at_home
columns.dc:title: Client - Main Language Spoken at Home
columns.schema:description: The language reported by a client as the main language other than English spoken by that client in his/her home (or most recent private residential setting occupied by the client) to communicate with other residents of the home or setting and regular visitors, as represented by a code.

columns.name: prof_english
columns.dc:title: Client - Proficiency in Spoken English
columns.schema:description: The self-assessed level of ability to speak English, asked of people whose first language is a language other than English or who speak a language other than English at home.

columns.name: client_tags
columns.dc:title: Client - Tags
columns.schema:description: List of tags for the client.
